name: multi-cursor-search
description: Search from multiple cursors at once.

multiCursorSearch.plainSearch.ignoreCase.markdownDescription: Specifies if case should be ignored when performing **plain searches**. Internally, this enables the `i` RegExp flag. See the [JavaScript RegExp docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp#Parameters).

multiCursorSearch.regexpSearch.ignoreCas.markdownDescription: Specifies if the ignore case (`i`) flag should be used when performing **RegExp searches**. See the [JavaScript RegExp docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp#Parameters).

multiCursorSearch.regexpSearch.multiline.markdownDescription: Specifies if the multiline (`m`) flag should be used when performing **RegExp searches**. See the [JavaScript RegExp docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp#Parameters).

multiCursorSearch.regexpSearch.dotAll.markdownDescription: Specifies if the "dotAll" (`s`) flag should be used when performing **RegExp searches**. See the [JavaScript RegExp docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp#Parameters).

multiCursorSearch.regexpSearch.unicode.markdownDescription: Specifies if the Unicode (`u`) flag should be used when performing **RegExp searches**. See the [JavaScript RegExp docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp#Parameters).
